msg: `Session.last_bookmark()` was deprecated and has been superseded by `Session.last_bookmarks()`. The logic is similar, but the new method returns `neo4j.Bookmarks` rather than `str`.
`Neo4jError.is_fatal_during_discovery()` was deprecated and will be removed without replacement.
`Neo4jError.invalidates_all_connections()` was deprecated and will be removed without replacement.

`Node.id` and `Relationship.id` were deprecated and have been superseded by `Node.element_id` and `Relationship.element_id`. Old identifiers were integers, wereas new elementIds are strings. This also affects Graph objects as indexing graph.nodes[...] and graph.relationships[...] with integers has been deprecated in favor of indexing them with strings.
`Duration.subseconds` was deprecated in {deprecated} and removed in {removed}. Use `nanoseconds` instead.
`Duration.hours_minutes_seconds` was deprecated in {deprecated} and removed in {removed}. Use `hours_minutes_seconds_nanoseconds` instead.
`Time.hour_minute_second` and `DateTime.hour_minute_second` was removed in {removed}. Use `hour_minute_second_nanosecond` instead.
`Time.second` returns an int instead of a float. Use `nanosecond` to get the sub-second information.

`ResultSummary.server.version_info` was deprecated in {deprecated} and removed in {removed}. Use `ResultSummary.server.agent`, `ResultSummary.server.protocol_version`, or call the `dbms.components` Cypher procedure instead.
`neo4j.Bookmark` is deprecated. Use `neo4j.Bookmarks` instead.
Importing `neo4j.Bookmark` and its submodules has been deprecated. Everything should be imported directly from `neo4j` instead.
Importing `neo4j.work` and its submodules has been deprecated. Everything should be imported directly from `neo4j` instead.
Importing `neo4j.packstream` has been deprecated: it's internal and should not be used by client code.
Importing `neo4j.routing` has been deprecated: it's internal and should not be used by client code.
Importing `neo4j.config` has been deprecated: it's internal and should not be used by client code.

Importing `neo4j.meta` has been deprecated: it's internal and should not be used by client code. `ExperimantalWarning` should be imported directly from neo4j. `neo4j.meta.version` is exposed through `neo4j.__version__`.

Importing `neo4j.data` has been deprecated: it's internal and should not be used by client code. `Record` should be imported directly from `neo4j` instead. `neo4j.data.DataHydrator` and `neo4j.data.DataDeydrator` have been removed without replacement.
Importing submodules from `neo4j.time` (`neo4j.time.[arithmetic|clock_implementations|hydration|metaclasses]`) has been deprecated. Everything needed should be imported from neo4j.time directly.
The `trust` option has been deprecated. Use `trusted_certificates` instead.

`update_routing_table_timeout` was removed. Server-side keep-alives communicated through configuration hints together with `connection_acquisition_timeout` are sufficient to avoid the driver getting stuck.

`session_connection_timeout` was removed. Server-side keep-alives communicated through configuration hints together with `connection_acquisition_timeout` are sufficient to avoid the driver getting stuck.
The argument `subseconds` to `neo4j.time.Duration` was deprecated in {deprecated} and removed in {removed}. Use `milliseconds`, `microseconds`, or `nanoseconds` instead.
The `neo4j.time.Time` constructor does not accept floats for `second` anymore. Use `nanosecond` instead. Similar remarks hold for the object property `second`.

`Session.read_transaction()` was deprecated in favor of `Session.execute_read()`. The logic is the same, but the argument type changed from `Transaction` to `ManagedTransaction`, and explicit transaction handling methods (`.commit()`, `.rollback()`, `.close()`) are not available on managed transactions anymore.

`Session.write_transaction()` was deprecated in favor of `Session.execute_write()`. The logic is the same, but the argument type changed from `Transaction` to `ManagedTransaction`, and explicit transaction handling methods (`.commit()`, `.rollback()`, `.close()`) are not available on managed transactions anymore.
`neo4j.spatial.hydrate_point` and `neo4j.spatial.dehydrate_point` have been deprecated without replacement: they are internal functions.
`neoj4.Config`, `neoj4.PoolConfig`, `neoj4.SessionConfig`, and `neoj4.WorkspaceConfig` have been deprecated without replacement: they are internal classes.
`neo4j.data.DataHydrator` and `neo4j.data.DataDeydrator` have been removed without replacement.
`neo4j.SummaryNotificationPosition` is deprecated. Use `neo4j.SummaryInputPosition` instead.
